Text: If you don't see your request it's because I haven't got the book(s) you requested.Check future Floods,I get books in everyday so it might be in future uploads.

@BBS

Much appreciated for the Karen Kingsbury books you uploaded for me. The amount of time and effort you must put into getting these books for us is amazing, especially if you have a day job....how much sleep do you get? :-)....you truly deserve your V.I.P Status....CHEERS!!!!

Thanks so much for the uploads! Couple of requests if you have them - When Lightening Strikes Brrenda Novak, The Uninvited Heather Graham, The Lost Night Jayne Castle, Forged in Fire Trish McCallen, and any Nina Bruhns. Thanks so much for all you do! Would be lost without your uploads!

@seanpb

Your welcome

I get plenty of sleep Lol!

All my uploaded books are on my personal servers,I don't search the web for books so there's not too much time involved in putting together a flood

@cajacks71

"Lightening Strikes Brenda Novak"

"The Lost Night Jayne Castle"

"Forged in Fire Trish McCallen"

"The Uninvited Heather Graham"
